sentences: Ki-Yo (清貴, Kiyotaka, born on November 22, 1982) is a Japanese pop singer.
Since his debut, Ki-Yo has worked as a singer, composer, lyricist and ambassador of Miyagi Prefecture.
He's known as one of the few openly LGBT musicians in Japan.
History ==
Early life =
In 1982, Ki-Yo was born in Sendai, Miyagi.
He was musically influenced by Mariah Carey, Stevie Wonder, Aretha Franklin, Akiko Yano, Elton John, Billy Joel, Noriyuki Makihara, Whitney Houston.

sentences: Personal life ==
Ki-Yo is openly gay.
He came out in TOKYO RAINBOW PRIDE 2015.
He took part in "OUT IN JAPAN", a LGBT project by Singaporean photographer Leslie Kee.
